0.1.name: wordpress/gravajax-registration
0.1.description:
Adds a Gravatar to your blog's registration page that is updated via AJAX when a user types in their email and moves away from the email field, by tabbing or clicking out.

If no Gravatar is available, a message is displayed telling the user that they can configure one on the Gravatar site.

Props to Otto for bringing the 404 to my attention.
